To enter, to be entered: To be broaden, to make space
To become overpowered, to be overpowered,  to overpower,

داخل ہونا - کرنا: لوح محفوظ اور اسکے مختلف نام
To enter, to be entered: Divine tablet recording and its various names
To be near, to make it close
To work hard, to endure hardship
To help, assist, to wish for help
To stamp, to put a seal
Hand, either right hand or left hand, arm
To receive guidance, to give guidance
To be light(in weight), to make light

داخل ہونا - کرنا: کترا جانا – بچ کر نکل جانا

To enter, to be entered: Heat, to heat, to be hot
